大西洋戦域各方面において\n深海勢力が侵食しないよう\n各港湾の警備と制圧を実施: In various sectors of the Atlantic theater, prevent abyssal forces from invading. Enfore security and control of each port. Fleet, sortie!
艦隊を地中海方面に展開！\n北アフリカの要港オラン港\n方面の潜在敵艦隊を奇襲、: Deploy a fleet to the Mediterranean area! Launch a surprise attack on the potential enemy fleet in the key port of Oran in North Africa and neutralize them!
大西洋方面の艦隊戦力を結\n集、フリータウンへ展開！\n同地よりダカールの敵勢力: Concentrate fleet forces in the Atlantic region and deploy to Freetown! From there, launch a strong assault on the enemy forces in Dakar and annihilate them!
カタパルト作戦、発動！\n欧州要港の潜在深海戦力を無力化せよ！:
Launching Operation Catapult! Neutralise
potential Abyssals in key European ports!
Force H 地中海に出撃！ オラン港方面へ展開！\n潜在脅威を無力化、カタパ:
Force H, sortie to the Mediterranean Sea!
Deployment towards Oran! Neutralise threats
     and complete Operation Catapult.
Operation Menace 発動！\nダカール港の潜在敵戦力を無力化せよ！:
Operation Menace launched!
Neutralise enemy threats in the port of Dakar!
